net.sf.javaml.clustering

Class SOM

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.javaml.clustering.SOM
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Clusterer

    public class SOM
extends java.lang.Object
implements Clusterer
    An implementation of the Self Organizing Maps algorithm as proposed by Kohonen. This implementation is derived from the Bachelor thesis of Tomi Suuronen titled "Java2 implementation of Self-Organizing Maps based on Neural Networks utilizing XML based Application Languages for Information Exchange and Visualization.". (http://javasom.sourceforge.net/)
    Author:
    Tomi Suuronen, Thomas Abeel (thomas@abeel.be)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SOM.GridType
      Enumeration of all grid types that are supported in a self organizing map.
      static class  SOM.LearningType 
      static class  SOM.NeighbourhoodFunction 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SOM()
      Create a 2 by 2 Self-organizing map, using a hexagonal grid, 1000 iteration, 0.1 learning rate, 8 initial radius, linear learning, a step-wise neighborhood function and the Euclidean distance as distance measure.
      SOM(int xdim, int ydim, SOM.GridType grid, int iterations, double learningRate, int initialRadius, SOM.LearningType learning, SOM.NeighbourhoodFunction nbf)
      Create a new self-organizing map with the provided parameters and the Euclidean distance as distance metric.
      SOM(int xdim, int ydim, SOM.GridType grid, int iterations, double learningRate, int initialRadius, SOM.LearningType learning, SOM.NeighbourhoodFunction nbf, DistanceMeasure dm)
      Create a new self-organizing map with the provided parameters.

      This method will execute the clustering algorithm on a particular data set.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SOM

        public SOM()
        Create a 2 by 2 Self-organizing map, using a hexagonal grid, 1000 iteration, 0.1 learning rate, 8 initial radius, linear learning, a step-wise neighborhood function and the Euclidean distance as distance measure.

      • SOM

        public SOM(int xdim,
   int ydim,
   SOM.GridType grid,
   int iterations,
   double learningRate,
   int initialRadius,
   SOM.LearningType learning,
   SOM.NeighbourhoodFunction nbf)
        Create a new self-organizing map with the provided parameters and the Euclidean distance as distance metric.
        Parameters:
        xdim - number of dimension on x-axis
        ydim - number of dimension on y-axis
        grid - type of grid
        iterations - number of iterations
        learningRate - learning rate of the algorithm
        initialRadius - initial radius
        learning - type of learning to use
        nbf - neighborhood function

        nbf - neighborhood function
        dm - distance measure to use

    • Method Detail

      • cluster

        public Dataset[] cluster(Dataset data)
        Description copied from interface: Clusterer
        This method will execute the clustering algorithm on a particular data set. The result will be an array of Dataset where each data set is a cluster.
        Specified by:
        cluster in interface Clusterer
        Parameters:
        data - the data set on which to execute the clustering.
        Returns:
        the different clusters obtained by this clustering algorithm. Each cluster is represented as a separate data set.
